page.title: 14ERITH RIVER FRONTAGE (1)
page.content:
LANDSCAPE. From many places in Erith like Riverside Baths or the multi-storey car park you see a wide stretch of the Thames. You can also see the flood precaution walls on either side of the river. Behind the river frontage the land rises steeply. On the opposite bank you can see flat Essex. N.Baker.
TRANSPORT. Roads have improved near the town centre. Bus routes are regular to many shopping centres. From the railway station, trains take commuters to London. Large ships come into the Deep Wharf with large bales of paper and timber. J.Haire.
